Useful General Commands File Management \# Compress files gzip large_file.txt

# Decompress

gunzip file.txt.gz

# Archive directory

tar -czf archive.tar.gz directory/

# Extract archive

tar -xzf archive.tar.gz

# Disk usage

du -sh /home/ubuntu/analysis/\*

Text Processing \# Count lines wc -l file.txt

# Search for pattern

grep "pattern" file.txt

# Column formatting

column -t -s',' file.csv

# Sort numerically

sort -n file.txt

# Unique entries

sort file.txt \| uniq -c

Process Management \# Check running processes top

# Kill process

kill PID

# Run in background

command &

# Check background jobs

jobs

Troubleshooting Common Issues Out of Memory \# Check memory usage free -h

# Reduce threads

# Change -t 4 to -t 2 in commands

Command Not Found \# Check if installed which program_name

# Activate conda environment

conda activate genomics

# Add to PATH

export PATH=\$PATH:/home/ubuntu/Software/tool/bin

Permission Denied \# Make script executable chmod +x script.sh

# Change ownership

sudo chown ubuntu:ubuntu file.txt

Disk Space Issues \# Check space df -h

# Find large files

du -h /home/ubuntu \| sort -rh \| head -20

# Clean up

rm -rf /home/ubuntu/analysis/temp/\*
